alert.note: Alert for Eastern Culberson County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 6:49PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL EDDY AND NORTH CENTRAL CULBERSON COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CDT/630 PM MDT/... At 649 PM CDT/549 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of McKittrick Canyon, or 15 miles east of Pine Springs, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Whites City and Carlsbad Caverns National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
